sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"思想，观点，观念"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: idea, concept, conception, thought, notion, impression
means: idea ： 最普通常用词，几乎适用于任何方面的思维活动。
concept ： 指从众多实例中通过概括、归纳而形成的对事物本质、全貌及其内部联系的概念或看法。
conception ： 通常指个人或一些人所持有的具体概念或念头，也可指概念的形成过程，含一定的想象和感情色彩意味。
thought ： 指以推理、思考等智力活动为基础的心理思维活动及其结果。
notion ： 指的是一种模糊的，变化的莫测的想法，无可靠的基础，未经深思熟虑的观点。
impression ： 指外部刺激在思想中所产生的印象。

sentence.Network_en: The notion that art should be controlled by intellectuals sickened him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他讨厌艺术应由知识分子所掌控的观点。

sentence.Network_en: The very notion of price competition is foreign to many schools.
sentence.Network_cn: 价格竞争这个概念对于许多学校都很陌生。

sentence.Network_en: Their relationship turned the standard notion of marriage on its head.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的关系完全颠覆了传统的婚姻观念。

list.abs: ２０年前，全世界的金融衍生产品的名义价值（Notional Value）总额几乎为零，到２００６年，这个市场的总规模已经达到370万亿 …

动词从其含义来分，有实义动词(notional verb)，连系动词(1ink verb)，情态动词(modal verb)和助动词(auxiliary verb)四类。 1. 实义动.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin notio(n-) idea, from notus 'known', past participle of noscere

entry.def: A notion is an idea or belief about something.

example.ex: We each have a notion of just what kind of person we'd like to be...
example.tran: 我们每人都有一个自己想成为什么样的人的想法。

example.ex: I reject absolutely the notion that privatisation of our industry is now inevitable...
example.tran: 我绝对不能接受我们这一产业的私有化目前已成必然的看法。

entry.tran: 针头线脑(指针线、纽扣、拉链等小件缝纫用品)
entry.def: Notions are small articles for sewing, such as buttons, zips, and thread.

means.word_mean: 1. a vague idea in which some confidence is placed;

sentences.sentence: "what are your feelings about the crisis?"
"it strengthened my belief in his sincerity"
"I had a feeling that she was lying"

means.word_mean: 3. an odd or fanciful or capricious idea;

sentences.sentence: "the theatrical notion of disguise is associated with disaster in his stories"
"he had a whimsy about flying to the moon"
"whimsy can be humorous to someone with time to enjoy it"

means.word_mean: 4. (usually plural) small personal articles or clothing or sewing items;

auth_sentence.content: The notion would have been laughed out of town.
auth_sentence.res_content: The notion would have been laughed out of town.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The notion would have been laughed out of town.

auth_sentence.content: He says this notion of fear is not normal.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says this notion of fear is not normal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says this notion of fear is not normal.

auth_sentence.content: A Laplander...has no notion of the relish of wine.
auth_sentence.res_content: A Laplander...has no notion of the relish of wine.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A Laplander...has no notion of the relish of wine.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 显而易见的, 值得注意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: notice注意到,注意+able……的→adj.显而易见的, 值得注意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+orious多……的→多惹人注意的→臭名昭著的
notorious[[adj.臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的]]→n.臭名昭彰
denote[v.指示,表示,意味着]+ation表名词→n.指示

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得注意的,显著的,著名的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+able能……的→n.值得注意的,显著的,著名的
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
note笔记+book→n.笔记簿, 笔记本

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通知,通告,布告;注意,认识
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ion表名词→n.概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
de加强+not知道,注意,注释+e→指示
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
not知道,注意,注释+ify表动词→给以注意→通知
not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

Sentence.sentence: The popular notion that older people need less sleep than younger adults is a myth, scientists said yesterday.
There are many false notions about it.
The central notion of social learning theories is that people learn attitudes, beliefs, and behaviors through social interaction.
The third type of feedback is disconfirmation, which occurs when others fail to respond to your notion of self by responding neutrally.

However, the relatively inexpensive computer technology that is readily available today is causing some to challenge the notion that home schooling is in any way inferior to more highly structured classroom education.

means.word_mean: 概念, 观念, 看法

sentences.en: One common Chinese notion is that the elders ought to be respected.
sentences.cn: 中国人共有的一种观念是长者应受到尊敬。

means.word_mean: 突然的念头, 奇想; 意图, 打算

sentences.en: He had a sudden notion to visit all his relatives.
sentences.cn: 他心血来潮, 突然想去拜访他所有的亲戚。

sentences.en: I haven't the faintest notion what you're talking about.
sentences.cn: 我对于你所讲的话一点儿也不懂。

jushi.english: Your head is full of silly notions.
jushi.chinese: 你满脑子都是愚蠢的想法。

jushi.english: He has no notion of the difficulty of this problem.
jushi.chinese: 他不了解这个问题的难处。

jushi.english: He had no notion of running the risk.
